ai-voice.title: Just say it, We'll handle the rest.
ai-voice.subtitle: Speak your task out loud. AI instantly turns it into a task and adds it to today's schedule.

breakdown.title: Break tasks down
breakdown.subtitle: Turn big goals into bite-sized steps you can finish fast.

star-spark.title: Catch ideas before they fade
star-spark.subtitle: Save your thoughts in Star Spark, Spin the gacha, and AI picks one task for you to do today.
